Hanzi: 宾

賔字的基本解释

賔
bīn
古同“宾”。

賔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bīn］
［《廣韻》必鄰切，平真，幫。］
“宾1”的繁体字。亦作“賔1”。
(1)宾客。
(2)尊敬。
(3)以客礼相待。
(4)作客；客居。
(5)服从；归顺。
(6)陈列。
(7)指事物之名。常与“實”对举。
(8)戏曲用语。即对话。
(9)上古官名。
(10)通“儐”。引导；迎宾。
(11)通“濱”。水边。
(12)通“濱”。紧接；临近。
(13)用同“鑌”。参见“賓鐵”。
(14)姓。春秋有宾起、宾孟。见《左传·昭公二十二年》。
[②]［bìn］
［《集韻》必仞切，去稕，幫。］
通“擯1”。
摈弃；排除；拒却。

賔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1209第02
【韻會】俗賓字。【五經文字】賓，經典相承作賔已久，不可攺正。

賔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
賔字的起名意思

暂无。

Bladder
Basic explanation of words
Bladder
bīn
Gu Tong "bin".
Bladder
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bīn］
["Guangyun" must be neighbors, plain, help. ]
Traditional characters for "宾1". Also known as "Bladder 1".
(1) Guests.
(2) Respect.
(3) Treat each other with courtesy.
(4) Being a guest; living as a guest.
(5) Obey; submit.
(6) Display.
(7) Refers to the name of things. Often opposed to "real".
(8) Opera terms. That is dialogue.
(9) Ancient official names.
(10) Through "brother". Guide; welcome guests.
(11) Link "Bin". Waterside.
(12) Link "Bin". Immediately after; approaching.
(13) Use the same "镔". See "Bin Tie".
(14) Last name. There are Binqi and Binmeng in Spring and Autumn. See "Twenty-two Years of Zuo Zhuan · Zhaogong".
[②]［bìn］
["Jiyun" must be cut, go to the 稕, help. ]
Same as "摈1".
Abandon; exclude; reject.
Bladder
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　賔; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1209 No. 02
[Rhyme Club] Vulgar guest characters. 【Texts of the Five Classics】Bin, the classics have been inherited for a long time, so you can’t straighten them.
